item.title: Yell Command
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

Hey guys its rigsy. And im having some troubles with coding. i put my namev in a certain yell command and it didnt work, this is what the yell with my command looks like:

}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“HOmework”)) {
c2.sendMessage("[@pur@Owner/Coder@bla@] “+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +”: “+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +”");

I need another one .

Or if thats the correct one or not the correct one please help me fix it

Thanks
Best regards ~Chris.
